Articles.Content:
So as of now, mine is "Rocketeer"

Does anyone know a list of all the ranks it gives you based on your forum posts?

Looks like above 1000 posts (maybe to 1250) is Senior Rocket Scientist, though my title is usually different.

Also, 0-5 posts is Curious George, or at least it was when I joined. I'll go check.

Edit: check that, below a certain number of posts it looks like there is no title. That lower limit is probably 5, like I said before.

There are quite a few. From memory the thresholds are 50, 100, 200, 500, 1000, 2500. I probably got a few of them wrong, and I don't remember all the titles anymore. Almost everyone on the forum uses a custom user title anyway, so the default post-count-assigned ones don't really get much use at all.

If you dig through the Announcements forum, I think KasperVld or sal_vager posted a brief list of the titles and their associated post counts a while back.

I made a list a while back for a similar question in here:

0 Curious George

5 Bottle Rocketeer

25 Rocketeer

50 Rocketry Enthusiast

100 Spacecraft Engineer

250 Sr. Spacecraft Engineer

500 Junior Rocket Scientist

750 Rocket Scientist

1000 Senior Rocket Scientist

1500 Capsule Communicator

3000 Flight Director

Not sure if there are more beyond Flight Director.
That was just what I was looking for! Thanks!
Of course, if you get bored of that, or don't feel like fitting in, there's always the customise option.

Of course, if you get bored of that, or don't feel like fitting in, there's always the customise option.

Where do you find that?

I made a list a while back for a similar question in here:

0 Curious George

5 Bottle Rocketeer

25 Rocketeer

50 Rocketry Enthusiast

100 Spacecraft Engineer

250 Sr. Spacecraft Engineer

500 Junior Rocket Scientist

750 Rocket Scientist

1000 Senior Rocket Scientist

1500 Capsule Communicator

3000 Flight Director

Not sure if there are more beyond Flight Director.

You really have too much time on your hands

Someone did make a user title above Flight Director, not sure who.

So...sal_vager is Goku? Good to know.

michaelsteele3: Click the "Settings" link at the top of the page, then "Edit Profile" on the left side of the settings page. You can enter whatever you like in the "Custom User Title" box (I think there might be a length limit, though).
I don't yell as much as the real Goku
Sal has a silent yell, a yell that permeates the very fabric of reality. Incidentally, it is his yell that caused the chain of events that led to the creation of the forum.
